entry.title: How to deliver on Machine Learning projects
entry.quote: In this article, we’ll describe our conception of the “OODA Loop” of ML: the ML Engineering Loop, where ML Engineers iteratively: Analyze, Select an approach, Implement, Measure

entry.title: State of the Art: Reproducibility in Artificial Intelligence
entry.quote: To quantify the state of reproducibility of empirical AI research using six reproducibility metrics measuring three different degrees of reproducibility.

entry.title: The web is broken, so its founder is taking another stab at it
entry.quote: Tim Berners-Lee, the British computer scientist credited with inventing the web in 1989, announced a new project today that he hopes will radically change his creation, by giving people full control over their data.

entry.title: Presentation Matters, or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Data Communication
entry.quote: It’s less designing to evoke emotion and more designing to best serve the data — and the audience.
